main.name: Nick Kwok
main.description: I bring an undying passion for coding, a conviction for excellence, an unending desire to learn/grow as a developer and a heart to coach, train and empower others
main.bio: I am a developer that is passionate about empowering people and businesses through the power of technology. I enjoy experimenting with new technologies and incorporating them into new projects. I'm currently developing an app called TripSpirian utilizing a React, Experss, Node and PostgreSQL stack and pushing code to my GitHub almost everyday! If you want to connect and talk dev, my contact info is below!
main.contactmessage: Wanna talk tech and/or collaborate on a future project? Drop me a message and lets connect!

resume.skillmessage: Here are the skills, languages and technologies I have learned to use in my time as a Full Stack Developer

education.description: 32+ hour of effective business communication, writing, conflict management and leadership curriculum.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science - Business Information and Decision Systems
education.description: As an IDS major, I took several technical courses: (IDS 306 & 406) - Data and Systems Analysis/Design (IDS 315) - Visual Basic (IDS 380) - Data Management - MySQL, PHP (IDS 460) - Project Management (IDS 481) - E-Business and Web Dev (HTML/CSS, PHP, MySQL) (IDS 492) - Managing/Deploying Information Systems

work.title: Software Engineer - Intern
work.description: Arcaio provides strategic consulting and advisory services for technology companies, including several high profile startups in the SF Bay Area and Los Angeles.
work.contributions: Received direct mentorship from senior developer on Python and software fundamentals. Developed Python library to aggregate and visualize table statistics using Pandas, Matplotlib and AWS Athena.

work.title: Full Stack Developer - Intern
work.description: Silver City Uprising is a non-profit organization that is building an online platform that provides mentoring and career development to under-resourced youth in hope of decreasing youth involvement with gang activity and increasing community involvement. We are building this platform with a PERN (PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node Stack) stack.
work.contributions: Built and styled several React Components for member's portal UI to improve UX. Built back-end API that allows members to access the core features of SCU's portal.

work.title: WordPress Engineer
work.description: The Roof Tiger is a roofing & siding business in Illinois that focuses on loving people, families and their homes.
work.contributions: Designed, built and deployed a website for The Roof Tiger with WordPress and helped them collect customer contact info in one week. I used Elementor to build, setup their contact database with WPForms and setup them up for eCommerce using WooCommerce. See my portfolio for original design prior to their changes.

work.title: Greater Los Angeles Managing Director
work.description: Greek IV is a non-profit orgazniation that holistically develops Fraternity and Sorority students in their leadership development and spiritual growth.
work.contributions: In my time serving with Greek IV, I helped to expand Greek IV to 7 new campuses impacting ~250 students per year. I have hired, created and executed trainings for 15 intern & staff. I have recruited and developed over 50 key leaders in movement. I have raised over $715k in donations over the span of 10 years. I have organized and ran operations for 2 annual conferences serving ~150 students.

work.title: Regional Director (IL, IN, WI, MI)
work.description: Sigma Phi Epsilon (SigEp) is a non-profit National Fraternity that complement's the educational experience for fraternity men by delivering premier student experiences. SigEp helps to strengthen character, build leadership and interpersonal skills and learn to develop healthy, lifelong relationships that are essential to a successful and fulfilling life.
work.contributions: As a Regional Director, I oversaw the growth, development and fiscal health of 23 SigEp chapters across 4 states by influencing chapter leadership and cultivating partnership with alumni and university staff. I was a 2x John C. Henry recipient for highest performing Region for of the 4 quarters.

work.title: IT Project Management Intern
work.description: I was accepted into AT&T IT Internship Program where I served alongside a team of developers, testers and project managers.
work.contributions: As an IT Project Management Intern, I assisted three different IT Project Managers in performing audts, impact assessments and performing data migrations. I was two of 8 interns asked to return and received a job offer to become a Junior IT Project Manager.

projects.title: Designo Multi-Page Site
projects.category: Made a fully responsive website after being given the Figma design
projects.techUsed: Built using React, React-Router, Context and styled with SCSS. Fully desktop, tablet and mobile responsive.

projects.title: Secrets
projects.category: Post one anonymous secret, read countless others!
projects.techUsed: HTML/CSS/EJS for frontend and built the API with Node/Express, Bcrypt and OAuth for authentication and Mongoose to interact with MongoDB.

projects.title: Countries App
projects.category: Need information about a country? Look no further!
projects.techUsed: Built with React, React-Router, SCSS and the REST Countries API with the ability to toggle themes.

projects.title: IP Address Finder
projects.category: Need to find a location by the IP Address? You can use this web app. If you leave the box empty, you can also get your own location!
projects.techUsed: Built with HTML/CSS/JS, jQuery/AJAX, the Leaflet and MapBox APIs for the map and pins

projects.title: Restaurant Finder
projects.category: Look up reviewed restaurants and/or add your own restaurant to critique with this handy React Restaurant App!
projects.techUsed: Built with Reactand  styled with React-Bootstrap. API calls use Axios. API built using Node/Express using PostgreSQL for the DB.

projects.title: Burger Builder
projects.category: Create and order a delicious burger :)
projects.techUsed: Built with React styled with React modules. Used firebase for authentication, database and deployment.

projects.title: React Shopping List
projects.category: Need something to help organize your shopping runs? Look no further!
projects.techUsed: Built using React and React Bootsrap showcasing the use of ALL built-in React Hooks. DB and deployment with Firebase.

projects.title: React Todo List
projects.category: Need a quick todo list to help you keep track of your day? Check this one out!
projects.techUsed: Built with React and React Bootsrap. API made with Node/Express and used PostreSQL for the DB.

projects.title: Task List Creator
projects.category: Make your own task list by adding a '/<listName' after the .com!
projects.techUsed: Built using EJS templating with a Node/Express API. Used Mongoose to interact with MongoDB and deployed on Heroku.

projects.title: The Roof Tiger
projects.category: Roofing company that needed a website redesigned and deployed in one week that could gather contacts from customers.
projects.techTitle: The Roof Tiger (See .gif for my original design - site has changed)
projects.techUsed: Build with WordPress. Used Elementor to design, WPForms for customer database and WooCommerce to setup future eCommerce.

projects.title: TripSpirian
projects.category: Need inspiration for your next travel destination? Look no further!
projects.techUsed: Built with React, React-Router and SCSS. Finished API made with Node/Express using Bcrypt & JWT for auth with PostgreSQL as the DB.

projects.title: Github Repos
projects.category: I have lots of undeployed sideprojects as well. Check'em out!
projects.techUsed: As a passionate coder, I push code to GitHub almost every, single day. Following along with my projects and learning on my GitHub!
